description.ca:
Cada cor té un nombre comptat de batecs en la vida, que ve determinat en néixer. Una persona afectada per la malaltia Kokuhaku compta amb molts menys batecs que una persona normal.  
Quan en Hato Iijima sorprèn la Hatsu Takagi amb un estrany dispositiu al pit, tot comença a canviar…
description.en:
A heart can only beat so many times in a lifetime. Cardiotemporitis, a rare condition that weakens the heart, leaves the victim with less heartbeats and a shorter lifespan than normal. With the right device, the amount of heartbeats remaining can be measured.  
  
When Hato Iijima accidentally walks in on Hatsu Takagi changing her clothes, he sees this device attached to her chest. Hatsu has resigned herself to an uneventful and isolated life to avoid elevating her heart rate. However, she expresses her true desire—to freely and wholeheartedly experience every second she has left. Recognizing her wish, Hato swears to help her enjoy life to the fullest and make her heartbeat like crazy.
description.es: ¿Cómo pasas el tiempo que queda de tu vida cuando se mide en latidos del corazón? Esta es la historia de Hato Iijima y Hatsu Takagi, conectados entre sí por una enfermedad rara llamada "tempocardia".
description.gl: Que farías coa túa vida restante se el fose medido en latexos cardíacos? Esta é a historia de Hato Iijima e Hatsu Takagi, unidos por unha rara enfermidade chamada "cardiopatia hipertensiva". Do mesmo autor que Nisekoi e Double Arts.
description.he: בחור צעיר בטעות מציץ לנערה כשהיא מתלבשת, ועכשיו הם מנגנים ביחד.
description.pt: O que você faria com seu tempo restante de vida se ele fosse medido em batimentos cardíacos? Essa é a história de Hato Iijima e Hatsu Takagi, ligados por uma doença rara chamada "Tempocardia". Do mesmo autor de Nisekoi e de Double Arts.
description.pt-br: O que você faria com seu tempo restante de vida se ele fosse medido em batimentos cardíacos? Essa é a história de Hato Iijima e Hatsu Takagi, ligados por uma doença rara chamada "Tempocardia".
description.ru: На что потратить оставшееся время, если оно измеряется ударами сердца? История Хато Иидзимы и Хацу Такаги, которые познакомились благодаря редкому недугу.

biography.en:
Naoshi Komi (古味直志, born March 28, 1986) is a Japanese manga artist. His works have debuted in Weekly Shōnen Jump magazine and its affiliates.

Komi was born in Tsuno, Takaoka District in the Aichi Prefecture.

Graduated from Art College Kobe, Komi debuted in Akamaru Jump in 2007. He said the magazine is known for featuring many newcomers. His first serialized work in Weekly Shonen Jump was Double Arts in 2008, which lasted for three tankōbon volumes.

His best known and most widely circulated work, Nisekoi, about a pair of high school students from rival gang families that are forced to be a couple, was serialized in Weekly Shōnen Jump, and has spawned a wider media franchise, including an anime series and a live-action film. 

He has cited One Piece as one of his major influences.

Favorite anime and manga: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Nausicaa of the Valley of the Wind, Death Note, Battle Angel Alita, Yotsuba&!, and One Piece.

Hobbies: Sight seeing and taking leisure walks.

Among his assistants there was Hasegawa Tomohiro.
